Server.Description:
What exactly is the VIKINGS MOD? The Vikings Mod is a massive overhaul for 7 Days to Die. You play as a survivor from the year 2026 who, together with your friends, was involved in a terrible car accident. All of your friends died in the crash - only you open your eyes again… but not in your own time.
You wake up in the year 845, weak, disoriented, and barely alive. From this moment on, survival becomes your only purpose. You must learn to live in the brutal world of the Viking Age, adapt to ancient traditions, and fight under the watchful eyes of the gods.
And unlike the original game, you won’t be fighting zombies. In this world, your enemies are diseased Vikings, warriors driven mad and corrupted by a mysterious plague spreading across the land. They are faster, more aggressive, and far more unpredictable than anything you’ve faced before - and they will stop at nothing to tear you down.
You will experience 7 Days to Die in a completely new way.
As you progress, you follow in the footsteps of the legendary Lodbrok clan, uncovering their stories, their battles, and their legacy. Your journey will shape you into a true warrior - stronger, wiser, and closer to the gods.
Your ultimate goal is to rise in power and become as mighty as Odin himself. Only then will you be ready for the final challenge: a boss battle against Fenrir, the monstrous wolf of the saga.
Defeat him, and your destiny is sealed - from that moment on, you will rule the land as a true Viking legend.
IMPORTANT INFORMATION -Not compatible with any other mods The Vikings Mod is a full overhaul and must be played without additional mods.
-Mod translation available in EN and DE only No other languages are supported at this time.
-Disable subtitles Subtitles should be turned off for the intended experience.
-Dynamic Music: OFF Please disable dynamic music in the audio settings.
-UI Transparency Settings Background: 95% Foreground: 100%
-Do not press any keys during the intro video Let the intro play fully to avoid loading issues.
VIKINGS MOD – Release Notes The Vikings Mod is a full massive overhaul of 7 Days to Die. Nearly every part of the original game has been redesigned, expanded, or completely replaced. The list below highlights the major features, though it is impossible to capture everything this overhaul includes.
World and Environment -New handcrafted 8k Vikings World -Exclusive Viking‑only POIs -Large collection of new 3D models, structures, and decorations -New meshes for buildings, objects, and environmental details -Hidden Viking Easter eggs throughout the world
Story and Progression -Fully developed storyline -Unique Learn by Gods system -Hybrid skill system for flexible character development -Completely reworked skill tree -New buffs, including the powerful Bloodrage
Enemies and Threats -No zombies - instead you face diseased Vikings, warriors driven mad by a mysterious plague -Many new enemy types and variants -Massive wandering hordes -Overhauled Blood Moon event - now transformed into Ragnarök -Epic boss battle against Fenrir
Equipment and Weapons -New sets of Viking armor -A wide range of new melee and ranged Viking weapons -Countless unique Viking weapons
Crafting and Workstations -Brand‑new workstations -New healing and recovery system -Completely redesigned loot system with new loot containers
Travel and Exploration -Rideable horses -Multiple Viking ships for long‑distance travel
Traders and User Interface -Five completely new traders -Fully redesigned menu and UI -New icons, layouts, and a complete Viking‑themed interface
System Requirements Minimum Requirements -These specs allow the game to run, but with reduced settings and occasional performance drops -OS: Windows 10 (64‑bit) -CPU: Intel i5‑7500 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200 -RAM: 12 GB -GPU: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB / AMD RX 580 8GB -VRAM: Minimum 6 GB, 8 GB recommended to avoid blurry textures (F1 fix command: gfx st budget 0) -Storage: 4 GB (Mod) + 20 GB (7 Days to Die) -Notes: Low/medium settings recommended, 8k world may load slowly, large hordes and many meshes can cause FPS drops
Recommended Requirements -For smooth gameplay, stable FPS, and high‑quality visuals -OS: Windows 10/11 (64‑bit) -CPU: Intel i7‑9700K / AMD Ryzen 5 5600X -RAM: 16–24 GB -GPU: NVIDIA RTX 2060 Super / RTX 3060 or AMD RX 6700 XT -VRAM: 8 GB or more (important due to many new assets) -Storage: 4 GB (Mod) + 20 GB (7 Days to Die) -Notes: Ideal for 8k world, large wandering hordes, Ragnarök events, and many new enemy types; UI overhaul and new textures benefit from higher VRAM
VM Known Bugs / Errors -WRN LOD0 ROCK_02 A warning related to a rock LOD model occasionally appearing in the logs.
-Blocks occasionally turn invisible Some world blocks may temporarily disappear or fail to render.
-WRN Spawn VM_IVAR_01 can’t walk on block sleeperIdle 24314 with walkType 21 A pathfinding issue where a specific entity cannot navigate certain block types.
-Animals get stuck on decorative objects Wildlife may become trapped on certain deco meshes.
-Duplicate item output In rare cases, items may appear twice.
-Backpack icons overlap Inventory icons may visually overlap or clip.
-Wandering hordes at high Game Stage may include vanilla zombies At very late game stages, vanilla zombies may appear unintentionally.
-Horse animation stuck — game restart required Horse animations may freeze and require a full game restart.
-WRN Entity block on pos 1865, 17, 908 not found! A warning indicating a missing or unloaded block at a specific world position.
-Blurry textures on vanilla assets when VRAM is below 8 GB Low VRAM can cause texture downscaling and blurriness. F1 fix command: gfx st budget 0
VIKINGS MOD - WISHMAP Audio and Atmosphere -In‑game music overhaul -Complete UI sound design pass
World and Environment -Northern Lights skybox -RWG support for Vikings Mod -Waterfall update with sound -Expansion of Construction Site POIs -More POIs and additional questlines -More Viking deco
Items and Crafting -Additional meshes for food and drinks -New items: blood sausage, arm ring, sun board, sun stone -Sun board + sun stone required to make the compass visible -More weapons -Apiary -Item scrapping -Shield blocking mechanics
Creatures and Wildlife -More enemies -Additional animals and breeding systems (coops, livestock, etc.)
Progression and Systems -Book system -More buffs -Expansion of the “My Minni” memory skill -Subtitle support
User Interface -Full completion of the UI overhaul -Additional UI sound effects
Community -And much more — submit your thoughtful suggestions via Discord
